text: Pehle aik Facebook business page banaein.  Apna business name, category aur description add karen.  Ek professional profile picture aur cover photo bhi upload karen.
Apna Facebook Ads account setup karen aur payment method add karen.  Business manager ko setup karen aur apne Facebook page ko connect karen.

step_heading: Step 3: Apni Pehli Campaign Launch Karen
text: Ab apni pehli Facebook ad campaign launch karen.  Apna objective (sales, leads, website traffic), target audience aur budget select karen.  Ek engaging ad creative (image ya video) aur ad copy banayen.

step_heading: Results Track Karen aur Optimize Karen
text: Apni campaign ke performance ko monitor karen aur results ke hisab se optimize karen.  Key metrics jaise CTR, CPC aur ROAS ko track karen aur zarurat ke mutabik changes karen.
